text: manusath derana wani madhya kalawatath eha giya janathawa wetha wadath samipa samaja subasadhanayak da oba aayathanaya magin siduwimen penenne oba aayathanaya rate podujanathawage unnathiya wenuwen kapawena nalikawak bawayi.

atham wita pawula thulin pawa sahayogayak nolada aya atham awasthawala wyakula swabhawayakin pawa hasirena awastha thibe.

shrimath anagarika dharmapala thumage nama asu sanin apage sihiyata nagenne, eda sudu adhirajyawadinge imahath pidawanta path wi siti sinhala jathiya nawathath awadi karamin nida watunu sinhala jathiya pubuduwalu ee asahaya yuga purushayage abhimanayayi.

somawathi wanantharaya abhyantharayata gaman kirimata thibunu parani jip ratha wana man siyallama manum departhamenthuwa wisin min wasara panahakata pera kalayaka patan sithiyam gatha karana lada eewa bawin manum departhamenthuwe sahaya labagena siyalu wana man yalith prathishtapana karaganimata hakiyawa atha.

ee aakarayatama ada dawase me sirilaka deshapalana kathikawe di nishshanka senadhipathi nam pudgalaya gana asa nathi kenek athnam deshapalana kathabahakata thaba, idiri mathiwaranayakadi chandaya pawichchi kirimatawath hawul kara ganimata nusudussek weyi.

kadinamin mathiwarana pawathwana lesath, wishesha adhikarana sthapitha kirima haraha siduwana deshapalana paliganim wahama nawathwana lesath, rajayata balakara sitima mema wirodhathawaye mulin pawasunu aramuna wannata athi wuwa da wirodhathawaye ee sandaha thanak nothibina.
hitlar jarmaniye balayata gena enne konsarwetiw paksha wisin kramayen wardhanaya wana samajawadi-komiyunist wadin mardhanaya kirime mewalamak washayeni.
hamadamath wathu piti kethwathu haraha aa sudu mudu sulaga wenuwata amuthu suwandikin panthi kamaraya piri giya.
meheyum komitiyen anukaraka sabha hayakata wishayan hayak bhara dunna.
sama kalapayakama siyalu ansha aawaranaya wana paridi the karmanthaye wishesha dakshatha penwu parshawakaruwan hadunagena owun agayime aramuna peradariwa sammana ulelak pawathwimata apeksha kere.
athurugiriye nishpadanaya karana sola kattalayak rupiyal hatathun dahasakata wikunanne ratama gonata andawamini.

malanika eliyen idiriyata gaman kala ma ekwarama ada watune kumak ho paya patalimen.ma athawu china jangama durakathanayada awasan gaman gos athi bawa watahune ewitayi.kese ho das andurata huru wu pasu ma dutu deyin ma bhithiyata path wuye ma patali thibune minis siruraka nisawen.bhithiya madagena sirura anek pasa peralu wita ma dutuwe apa mahacharyathumage le waki muhunayi.sihisunwa siti ohu osawa asala thibu mesayak matha diga karawa ohuge sihi ganmata yedu prayathnaya sarthaka karamin ohu kendirillak pita karannata wuwa.

ape tawume eha kone balika iskole maha awurudu uthsawayak thiyanna thiranaya wela.ee wunata eyalata ko grawund ekak.ithin ee iskole widuhalpathiniya ape widuhalpathithumagen illala thibuna ee awurudu uthsawaya ape grawund eke thiyanna.ape widuhalpathithuma kiyala thiyenawa ane ithin eyalage witharak neweyi apeth awurudu uthsawayak thiyanna thiyenawa,ee hinda dekama ekata thiyamu kiyala.(aththatama ee thinduwata nam mal thiyala wandinna oona,apita dena chans walata).kohoma hari onna dan awurudu uthsawayath thiyena dawasa aawa.
